text: Ah, Barron, your wit serves you well! In this moment of clarity, you discern a hidden pathway
behind a tapestry, leading deeper into the priory's mystery. What will you do now?
The air grows thick with anticipation as you step forward, the faint scent of old parchment and candle wax guiding your senses.
Shadows flicker along the stone walls, whispering secrets of the priory's forgotten past.
A distant bell tolls, echoing through the ancient halls. Somewhere beyond, a secret waits to be uncovered—its truth entwined with the fate of all who wander here.
The path ahead is long and winding, but you are determined to find the exit. What will you do?
You step forward, the faint scent of old parchment and candle wax guiding your senses.
Shadows flicker along the stone walls, whispering secrets of the priory's forgotten past.
